A4.text: having lost to New England in Super Bowl XXXIX

A5.text: the Eagles defeated the Patriots with a score of 41–33 to win their first Super Bowl and their first NFL title since 1960

A6.text: The Eagles were making their second-ever Super Bowl appearance after posting a 13–3 regular season record

A7.text: The Eagles did not return to the Super Bowl until 2017, when they exacted revenge on the Patriots in Super Bowl LII
